de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.fragment

Class PreferenceHeaderFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.fragment.PreferenceHeaderFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class PreferenceHeaderFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
    A fragment, which shows multiple preference headers and provides navigation to each header's fragment.
    Since:
    1.0.0
